item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)

item.title: My hunch is that authoritarian governments have a worse environmental record than democracies. This is why I’ve turned so political this past couple of years, because the fate of this planet depends on an inclusive socio-political paradigm that is interventionist but not authoritarian.

item.title: Top Comfrey Tip: when making a comfrey fertiliser, don’t add water. Simply put the chopped up comfrey in a colander (or other container with holes) and let the comfrey decompose and collect the liquid beneath.
